title: Bookmarks & Collections
problem: Users want to save interesting posts for later reference and organize them into meaningful collections. Bookmarks enable content curation and personal organization.
success_metrics: Users can create custom bookmark collections

items.title: Bookmark Model & Service
items.description: Define bookmark and collection models with comprehensive service.
acceptance_criteria: Bookmark interface with id, userId, postId, collectionId, createdAt
Collection interface with id, userId, name, color, icon, createdAt
BookmarkService with methods: bookmarkPost, removeBookmark, getBookmarks, getCollections, createCollection, deleteCollection, addToCollection

items.title: Bookmark Button Component
items.description: Create bookmark button for post cards.
acceptance_criteria: Filled icon when bookmarked, outline when not

items.title: Collection Manager Component
items.description: Create collection management interface for creating and organizing.
acceptance_criteria: Color picker for collection (8 preset colors)

items.title: Bookmarks Page Enhancement
items.description: Enhance bookmarks page with collections sidebar and filtering.
acceptance_criteria: Remove bookmark button on each post

items.title: Collection Detail View
items.description: Create dedicated view for individual collections.
acceptance_criteria: Collection header with name, color, count
